title: Leon Agency
description: A pixel-perfect conversion of a PSD template into a responsive website using HTML & CSS. Features a clean, professional agency layout.

title: Kasper Creative
description: A modern one-page artistic portfolio template. Implements complex layout techniques and attention to detail for a creative look.

title: Project Three
description: The third comprehensive design project from Elzero's curriculum, showcasing advanced layout patterns and styling.

title: Project Four
description: A sophisticated multi-section template focusing on structure, typography, and visual hierarchy.

title: To-Do List
description: A responsive and user-friendly To-Do List web application that allows users to add, manage, and persist tasks using LocalStorage. Built with HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript, focusing on clean UI, smooth UX, and core front-end concepts.
